file_content.text: It was an ambush, General. Imps came through a hidden entrance. Lost our CO, but the cavalry showed up just in time.
You've got my thanks. The Ion Wall did plenty of damage, but the Empire's recovering fast. The Corellian Council's shortcuts aren't helping.
As long as the Empire has the council, they have their inside knowledge. We have to find them.
Councillor Belos said they were in a secure location.
They'll be well-protected.
How much damage can the council do?
Inside knowledge?
Secret weapons, contingency plans... there might be ten things worse than the Ion Wall inside the Legislature alone.
The Empire's the one shooting at us.
We've got bigger problems.
We've lost our inside man. The Empire still has theirs. At this point, there's no such thing as a small advantage.
We've gone over the schematics with Captain Cantarus. He's identified a holdout room intended to keep the council safe in an emergency.
Darth Hadra of the Dark Council was their escort. If they're in the holdout room, she'll be in there with them.
Darth Acharon was a loose cannon. Is Darth Hadra the same?
I want to be prepared.
She's much more subtle. You'll lose your head before she does.
Darth Hadra might sacrifice the council before she'd lose.
Sith make bad escorts.
Protect the council if you have to. They should live to answer for their decision.
There's an awful lot of Imperials to get through first.
So will half the Empire.
We've mapped out the most direct route. My troops will be drawing a lot of their fire.
One member of the Dark Council might be my limit.
Not another Sith lord.
Well, we're hearing rumors of a third.
What makes this holdout room so secure?
Holdout room?
Walls of special durasteel. They can supposedly resist scanners, bombardment, even a natural disaster.
Can I count on backup if I need it?
Am I going in alone?
You have Republic reinforcements, of course. Captain Cantarus is leading his own assault, but assures me his officers will come if called.
The Green Jedi has also promised to send who they can spare.
How can I reach them if I'm in trouble?
Can we communicate?
I've never heard of the Green Jedi.
The Green Jedi?
Special enclave dedicated to protecting Corellia. You'll understand the name when you see their robes.
I don't need help.
Be a daredevil on your own time. In this battle, I want the odds stacked in the Republic's favor.
Our techs have rigged the Legislature's comm stations to connect directly to Republic dispatch. Use them to call for backup.
Remember, the Corellian Council is the Empire's ace in the hole. Find them before there are any more surprises.
We're pretty beat up, but our squad can provide backup if you need it. Orders?
I'll need help getting inside the holdout room.
Come with us.
Understood. Right behind you.
Hold this position. The Empire might come back.
Stay here, stay safe.
Don't worry about us. The Empire's lost this area for good.
When we're done, the Empire will regret they ever landed on Corellia.
